introduction.title: Build transparent mutual insurance community on blockchain with

status.off: Your metamask is not detected. Many important functions might not work

mission.text: a blockchain to build your insurance cooperative.

finance.text: how we want finance this initiative?

paragraph1: Fellows Project is open source (available on github) community based project which aims to build
DAO (Decentralized Autonomus Organisation), allowing person without technical knowledge to create own
community based insurance cooperative. It aims to implement all necessary logic on blockchain to minimalise bureaucratic
overhead needed to run such organisation. Use of blockchain will also minimalise trust needed to run such
paragraph2: FellowChain Project aims to be as blockchain agnostic as possible.
Starting its support from Ethereum Ropsten and Rinkeby Network during development and POA Core or LOOM in early adoption stage.
When project will achieve betatests maturity we will introduce 2nd layer solution based on Ethereum technology.
paragraph3: If You like the idea, You can partiicipate on github, or join us on facebook or telegram (see footer below).
See Join us, to find out, how You can participate.
description.tip: Requires Metamask and Rinkeby network to run

problem.title: Problem
description: Insurance industry is an example of business that, despite enormous
technological shift does not have changed much recently.
Problem of trusted execution of insurance
is still being solved by creating centralized big corporations controlled by even bigger governments.
This leads to information assymetry and conflict of interest. One of answers to this problem is rise of Mutual Insurance models.
Cooperatives where customers are at the same time stakeholders and insure each other in case of insurance event
Unfortunatelly they face their own problems, namely risk management and transparency of operation

solution.title: Solution!
description: Fellows Network aims to empower already existing mutual insurance models
by providing a blockchain based platform that will allow uninterupted,
transparent, semi-automated, rules-based executions of insurance agreements.
Our platform will also allow to properly assess effectivness of any mutual,
so they can self evolve in more professionally managed entities.
Fellows Network will erase information assymetry by providing infrastructure
for transparent organisations, so mutuals participants can ensure organisation
works for their benefit

finances.title: Funding
description: Every project need to take economical incentives under consideration in order to succeed.
Despite the fact that creating decentralized autonomous insurance company is great,
exciting idea by itself it is very hard to expect that idea alone will encourage people in participation.
Therefore Fellow Chain project will be backed up with Fellows Token in order to fund development.
Fellows Token will serve two main functions:

voting.title: Voting
content: Token can be used to vote on every platform related decision.
Every existing contract is owned by VotingContract and because of that,
any function with modifier ‘onlyOwner’ can be invoked only as a result of
Voting of Current owners of FCT, who temporarily locked their tokens in TokenLocker contract.

use.title: Platform Use
content: Once created use of Fellows platform will require payments in Fellow Chain Tokens.
Example operations that will be payed in FLS:
list: Payment for creation of new insurance cooperative
Recurring payment for use of platform by cooperative (proportional to number of participants)
content2: To create ever increasing value of FCT part of tokens earned from use of platform should be
burned (but this decision will be voted during later platform development).
